title: Pretty Secrets
description: Pledging the most powerful secret society in the world was always going to be difficult. Their Trials are legendary. Dangerous. Testing candidates in ways no one imagines.But what I don’t count on is being grouped together with three men who might hinder my real purpose.The tatted, reckless “black sheep” would rather ruin me than build me up.The royal bad boy’s stalker-like obsession knows no bounds.Then there’s my gorgeous Economics professor who’s perfect on the outside but rotten in the middle.Who would’ve thought the biggest test of all was going to be staying away from them?I can’t trust them with my secret though. They’re part of the same social elite that I despise. They’re tethered to the organization I plan to destroy.However, my body and my brain aren’t always on the same page.If they strip me down to uncover my truths, I’ll be the next tragic headline.No one crosses the Knights and lives.♥♥♥PRETTY SECRETS is the first book in a dark college RH romance series with a secret society, rich, powerful men, and a strong heroine on a desperate mission.
author: E.M. Moore
